thread.title: A Chance to Boost Financial Aid for Today’s High-School Sophomores
thread.title_full: A Chance to Boost Financial Aid for Today’s High-School Sophomores - WSJ

author: Veronica Dagher
title: A Chance to Boost Financial Aid for Today’s High-School Sophomores
text:
Attention, parents of high-school sophomores: There are financial steps you may want to take before year-end to help your child get more financial aid for the freshman year of college.
A recent executive order signed by President Barack Obama will change the rules for the Free Application for Federal Student Aid beginning with aid for the 2017-18 school year. Families will complete the form based on their “prior prior year” income... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
